Uses of Interface
com.seagullsw.appinterface.client.AppInterfaceConnection

  • Packages that use AppInterfaceConnection 
    Package Description
    com.seagullsw.appinterface.client
    This package supports the creation of objects representing client connections to an Application Interface Server (AIS).
    com.seagullsw.appinterface.client.java
    This package provides support for Java command beans, in the form of the command bean abstract superclass AppInterfaceCommand and its associated exception classes.

    • Uses of AppInterfaceConnection in com.seagullsw.appinterface.client

      Classes in com.seagullsw.appinterface.client that implement AppInterfaceConnection 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicAppInterfaceConnection
      This base abstract class may be extended to accommodate a variety of client-server communication protocols, such as sockets or HTTP.
      class  CicsEngineAppInterfaceConnection
      This is an AppInterfaceConnection that sends directly to the LegaSuite CICS Engine (LCE) via HTTP.
      class  HTTPAppInterfaceConnection
      Provides AIS HTTP client communication.
      class  SocketAppInterfaceConnection
      Communicates to the AIS via a socket.
      class  SslAppInterfaceConnection
      Provides AIS SSL socket client communication.
      class  TextAppInterfaceConnection
      Concrete subclasses use text, usually XML, as the encoding for communication with an AIS.
      Methods in com.seagullsw.appinterface.client that return AppInterfaceConnection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AppInterfaceConnection AppInterfaceConnectionFactory.createAppInterfaceConnection(java.io.File file)
      Creates a new AppInterfaceConnection configured from the File.
      AppInterfaceConnection AppInterfaceConnectionFactory.createAppInterfaceConnection(java.lang.String resourceName)
      Creates a new AppInterfaceConnection configured from the system resource name.
      AppInterfaceConnection AppInterfaceConnectionFactory.createAppInterfaceConnection(java.net.URI uri)
      Creates a new AppInterfaceConnection from the URI.
      AppInterfaceConnection AppInterfaceConnectionFactory.createAppInterfaceConnectionFromFile(java.net.URL url)
      Creates a new AppInterfaceConnection configured from the config file described by URL.
      static AppInterfaceConnection AppInterfaceConnectionFactory.createCicsEngineConnection(java.lang.String host, java.lang.String port)
      Returns an AppInterfaceConnection for HTTP-based communication with the LegaSuite CICS Engine at the specified host, using the specified port.
      static AppInterfaceConnection AppInterfaceConnectionFactory.createURLConnection(java.net.URL url)
      Deprecated. 
      Use createHTTPConnection(URL) instead.
      AppInterfaceConnection AppInterfaceConnectionBuilder.newInstance(java.io.File file)
      Builds a new AppInterfaceConnection based on the File argument.
      AppInterfaceConnection AppInterfaceConnectionBuilder.newInstance(java.lang.String resource)
      Builds a new AppInterfaceConnection based on the system resource argument.
      AppInterfaceConnection AppInterfaceConnectionBuilder.newInstance(java.net.URL url)
      Builds a new AppInterfaceConnection based on the contents of the file at the URL.

    • Uses of AppInterfaceConnection in com.seagullsw.appinterface.client.java

      Fields in com.seagullsw.appinterface.client.java declared as AppInterfaceConnection 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected AppInterfaceConnection AppInterfaceCommand.connection 
      Methods in com.seagullsw.appinterface.client.java that return AppInterfaceConnection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AppInterfaceConnection AppInterfaceCommand.getConnection()
      Returns the AppInterfaceConnectionobject through which the command bean performs its application interface function invocations.
      Methods in com.seagullsw.appinterface.client.java with parameters of type AppInterfaceConnection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AppInterfaceCommand.setConnection(AppInterfaceConnection connection)
      Sets the AppInterfaceConnectionobject through which the command bean performs its application interface function invocations.
      Constructors in com.seagullsw.appinterface.client.java with parameters of type AppInterfaceConnection 
      Constructor and Description
      AppInterfaceCommand(AppInterfaceConnection connection)
      Configures a new command bean to communicate with an AIS with the given AppInterfaceConnection.
